value:
$WmMPID_ナバール,ch01_02_Nabarl_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You're here, as expected.$k$pNothing against you, but I've
been hired to do a job.$k$pSo now, you'll die.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ナバール,ch01_02_Nabarl_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You're strong, all right. It's a close
call—which of you is stronger?$k$pYou...or him?$k$pHeh. This is going to get interesting.
I'm sure I'll see you around.$k$Sbs150|
